description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Historical Discourse in commemoration of the one hundredth Anniversary of the formation of the first Congregational Church in Templeton, Massachusetts. With an appendix, embracing a survey of the municipal affairs of the town" Author: ADAMS, Edwin G. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10411.g.25." Page: 121 Place of Publishing: Boston Date of Publishing: 1857 Publisher: Crosby, Nichols & Co.
